---
name: New theme
about: Create a new theme for Badoogle
title: "[THEME] <your theme name>"
labels: theme
assignees: sherkitty

---

Use the following template to design your theme, replacing the blank spaces with the colors of your choice.

```css
:root {
    /* LIGHT THEME COLORS */
    --badoogle-logo: #______;
    --badoogle-page-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-element-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-text: #______;
    --badoogle-contrast-text: #______;
    --badoogle-secondary-text: #______;
    --badoogle-result-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-result-title: #______;
    --badoogle-result-url: #______;
    --badoogle-result-visited: #______;

    /* DARK THEME COLORS */
    --badoogle-dark-logo: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-page-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-element-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-text: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-contrast-text: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-secondary-text: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-result-bg: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-result-title: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-result-url: #______;
    --badoogle-dark-result-visited: #______;
}
```
